name: Oilcloth Pocket Card Keeper (II)
description:
A simple, stitched oilcloth pocket is perfect to stash your business cards on the go (never be caught at the gym without your card again!) or a drivers license and a credit card for a night out (leave room in your clutch for your phone and lipgloss). 

It even makes a cute gift card holder when you want to give something a little extra. (Great for teachers and other professionals.) 

This pocket card wallet is handmade with Mexican oilcloth and is lined in the same. Because I make each one individually, one at a time, pattern placement and sizes vary from pocket to pocket. Measures about 3.75" long and about 2.75" high. 

Please select your pattern before you pop this goodie in your cart. 

If your first choice is no longer available, I will contact you. 

Ships via USPS 1st class mail to all locations. 

Travel (and give) fabulous:
http://jenni20designs.bigcartel.com

name: Oilcloth Passport Cover--Custom Designed
description:
Proclaim your personality while standing behind the yellow line with a 100% customizable handmade oilcloth passport cover. 

You travel in style, so why shouldn’t your passport? Keep your vital documents protected and easy to locate (no more frantic searching in the bottom of your handbag). Tuck each edge of your passport into the two interior pockets or use one of the pockets to stash a credit card or some cash. 

US Passports measure about 5” high and 3.5” wide. While there is no standard passport size, many countries have passports that measure about 90 x 125 mm. Most passports will fit, but please measure yours before purchasing—and convo if you’d like a different size.

Passport covers are topstitched and finished to allow room for secure fit. Each jenni20 designs passport covers is handmade, one at a time, so some variance in measurements is to be expected and pattern placement may vary. All have been fitted around my US Passport as pictured (not included). 

Ships for $1 to US customers via USPS 1st Class Mail. I ship all other jenni20 designs orders via USPS Priority--Canadian and Worldwide customers, please convo for a shipping quote and to make sure your documents will fit. 

Makes a great gift for a bride-to-be, a graduate, and anyone who loves to travel fabulous.

Photograph is for example purposes.  I will email you a swatch sheet so we can design your custom passport cover. 

Travel fabulous!

name: Travel Laundry Bag--Custom Designed
description:
A custom-designed travel laundry bag is perfect for travel--just roll it up, tuck it in your bag, and go. Once your journey is underway, it will separate your dirty clothes from the clean ones with style and pizzazz! (But it's also great for everyday!!)

This item will be made-to-order in the fabric of your choice.  

The Specifics: 
• made with 100% breathable cotton (the ribbon details are mostly poly blends); 
• pre-laundered (but when it gets dirty you should toss it in with your washing…washing with cool water not only helps save energy and money, but it will also save the life of this bag); 
• and sewn with French seams (no raw edges) for extra durability. 

The Down and Dirty: 
This travel-size laundry bag measures about 20x28"

Will ship via USPS Priority Mail once design has been agreed upon and production schedule set. 

Photo is for example purpose only.
